snippet.title: Goat Simulator 3: Multiverse of Nonsense DLC - Official Announce Trailer | Future Games Show 2024
snippet.description:
Prepare to save the universe the only way a goat can. Watch the bizarre Goat Simulator 3: Multiverse of Nonsense reveal trailer for the upcoming DLC coming to the action game. Join Pilgor on this adventure when the Goat Simulator 3: Multiverse of Nonsense DLC launches on PC (Epic Games Store, Steam, and Windows), PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S on June 19, 2024.

Explore a new sandbox world in the Multiverse of Nonsense DLC for Goat Simulator 3--from a cartoon town to a metropolis where goats are humans and humans are goats and a mythological mountaintop city. The Multiverse of Nonsense DLC also features a new linear story in which players will need to collect a series of gems by visiting a variety of locations through Multiverse rifts. The DLC also brings new goat gear, an in-game crossover, and the Capybara goat skin.

#GoatSimulator3 #GoatSimulator #Gaming
